page.description: Specify the method for navigating between the Panels contained in a PanelNavigator.

item.name: Programmatic
item.description: If *[ui:Programmatic]* is chosen, JavaScript must be used to navigate between Panels in the Panel Navigator.

item.name: TabButtons
item.description: Used with buttons placed in the Panel Navigator Header or Footer.

item.name: TabBand
item.description: Used in desktop web applications. Displays panels in the Panel Navigator as a collection of links in a tab band located at the top or bottom of the Panel Navigator. The Panel's *[link:Display name@ux control properties panel card properties display name]* is used to create a link for each panel in the tab band.

item.name: Carousel
item.description: Panels are navigated by swiping left or right. If a Panel can be vertically scrolled, scrolling will be disabled while the user is swiping left or right.

item.name: List
item.description: Displays a list of choices (and possibly sub-choices if a cascading list is defined.) Clicking on an item in the list shows a Panel.

item.name: OrientationChange
item.description: Used to specify a Panel that gets focus for landscape and another Panel that gets focus for portrait.
